German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Bleistift
Wikipedia de
Bleistift

Etymology[edit]

Blei (“lead”) +‎ Stift (“pen”)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈblaɪ̯ʃtɪft/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Bleistift m (genitive Bleistifts or Bleistiftes, plural Bleistifte)

  1. pencil (writing utensil with a graphite shaft)
